sentences.en: After accede to WTO, China is confronted challenge in lots of aspects.
sentences.cn: 中国入世之后, 面临多方面的挑战.

sentences.en: Are we ready to accede to WTO?
sentences.cn: 加入世贸,我们准备好了 吗 ?

sentences.cn: 第三条款无关紧要,可答应船主的要求.

sentences.en: Britain would not accede to France's request.
sentences.cn: 英国不肯同意法国的要求。

sentences.en: But draw lessons from, and accede to cannot replace creation after all.
sentences.cn: 但是借鉴, 和继承终究不能代替创造.

sentences.cn: 广州会议精神得以继承和发展.

sentences.en: I never understood why he didn't just accede to our demands at the outset.
sentences.cn: 我一直搞不懂他为什么不一开始就同意我们的要求。

sentences.en: I whispered to Catherine that she mustn't, on any account, accede to the proposal.
sentences.cn: 我低声对凯瑟琳说无论如何她决不能同意这个提议.

sentences.en: Other countries could accede to the deal if they wanted.
sentences.cn: 其他国家如果需要，却可能同意这种开放。

sentences.en: The Chinese are speeding up its step to accede to WTO.
sentences.cn: 中国正加快加入WTO组织的步伐.

sentences.en: The foreign Ministers expressed satisfaction with the latest developments of efforts of some ASEAN countries to accede to the World Trade Organization and support for their early entry.
sentences.cn: 外长们对部分东盟国家争取加入世界贸易组织的最新进展感到满意，并支持其早日加入。

sentences.en: They are academic to the Marxism below new historical requirement science accede and significant progress.
sentences.cn: 它们都是在新的历史条件下对马克思主义理论的科学继承和重大发展.

sentences.en: They are ready to accede to our request for further information.
sentences.cn: 我们要是还需要资料,他们乐于随时提供.

sentences.en: They to accede to our request for further information.
sentences.cn: 我们要是“还”需要资料,他们乐于随时提供.

sentences.en: They would not let him accede to a tenured position in his department.
sentences.cn: 在系里,他们不让他成为终身教授.

sentences.en: We are ready to accede to your request for further information.
sentences.cn: 你们如果还需要资料,我们乐于随时提供.

sentences.en: Will you accede to her request?
sentences.cn: 你答应她的请求 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 同意, 加入, 同意
trans.tran_en: When a member of a royal family accedes to the throne, they become king or queen

trans.tran_cn: （正式）加入，答应，（通过财产的添附而）增加，开始任职
trans.tran_en: When a member of a royal family accedes to the throne, they become king or queen
